extends java.lang.Object

      ShaderProgram(java.lang.String vertex, java.lang.String fragment)

      • ShaderProgram

        public ShaderProgram(java.lang.String vertex,
                     java.lang.String fragment)
        Create a new ShaderProgram and load the appropriate programs in the GPU's RAM before allocating the memory for VAO attributes
        Parameters:
        vertex - Path to the vertex shader file
        fragment - Path to the fragment shader file

        private static int loadShader(java.lang.String file,
                              int type)
        Load a shader from a file
        Parameters:
        file - path of the shader file
        type - indicate the type of shader (Vertex, Geometry, Tesselation, Fragment ...)
        Returns:
        the shader ID given by OpenGL

      • storeAllUniformLocations

        protected void storeAllUniformLocations(Uniform... uniforms)
        Allocate the memory on the GPU's RAM for all the Uniforms variables of this shader
        Parameters:
        uniforms - list of all the Uniforms to be used by the shader
